) } ], } async componentDidMount() { console.log('Using hardcoded voter data'); } updateEmail = event => { const d = event.currentTarget.id; const st = 'EmailVal' + event.currentTarget.id; const a = document.getElementById(st).value; alert(`Would update voter ${d} with email: ${a}`); } deleteEmail = event => { alert(`Would delete voter with ID: ${event.currentTarget.value}`); } renderTable = () => { return () } SidebarExampleVisible = () => (

); } } export default VotingList;
